summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, primarily consisting of official inmate count sheets, out-count forms, and inmate roster assignments for August 2-3, 2019. The records show routine prison population management, including a specific entry for Jeffrey Epstein being assigned to an attorney visit on August 3, 2019.

events.title: Epstein Attorney Visit Assignment
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is listed on an inmate roster with an assignment for an attorney visit (ATTY).

events.title: Routine Prison Population Counts
events.description: Multiple official count sheets and out-count forms document the inmate population at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, showing totals around 761 inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is documented as an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York with register number 76318-054.
An inmate roster for August 3, 2019, shows Epstein was assigned an attorney visit (ATTY), indicating legal activity the day before his death.
The documents consist of routine Bureau of Prisons administrative records (count sheets, out-count forms, rosters) from August 2-3, 2019.
The total inmate population at the MCC during these counts was approximately 761 individuals.
Other inmates are listed with various assignments including hospital (HOSP), food service (FS), and visits (VISIT, ATTY).
